website_summaries.verdict: Decent size for the price, and it has a slight curvature to it that makes it more comfortable to hold.
pros: Gives you coverage area of about 16 inches by 26 inches, which is perfect for one person to hold
2 reinforced handle straps on the back, so the blocking partner can hold the pad securely
Cover consists of a heavy-duty vinyl that will stand up to repeated contacts at practice
cons: It's very stiff in the corners, which negates the padding there

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Coaching youth flag football I needed a blocking pad to give the boys experience blocking without beating each other up. In the past I have used a blocking pad used by a local police department, but it tends to be too strong (more for absorbing strong kicks). This pad has been great. It is strong enough to not fully collapse under a strong hit, but also it doesn't hurt when you hit it. I am coaching 11 - 12 year olds and the size is perfect for them.
customer_reviews.author: Water Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Who are these people kidding that it absorbs contact striking and kicks?
customer_reviews.text: There is no way in hell this is good striking/kicking training. The cushion barely absorbs any of it. This might be great for kids and some teens. But if you get people who are actually working on leg kicks and strikes, this will not help you absorb any of the contact at all. You will feel most of the power. I had to get two pillows behind the cushion for it to work properly. But who paid 40$+ to have to carry two pillows with behind the shield? This shield is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Jayce32x

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy Enough for my purpose but still a great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a shield for when my autistic son attacks me. Wasn’t sturdy enough but I supposed of used for its intent, it would certainly be good enough. Would def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: francine barone

customer_reviews.title: Contact Shields
customer_reviews.text: I should've purchased the ones with three handles (two vertical and one horizontal across the top). But they absorb contact very well without being too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great bag great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Strong and durable. Size and curvature make for a great fit when instructing my 13 year old son punching and shielding blocks away from him. It’s a highly recommended bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dubs37

customer_reviews.title: Great for dad and son!
customer_reviews.text: I use it work with my 10 year old. Teach him basics and keeping him safe! Awesome for tackling and contact on running and catching. Also good to teach blocking!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Hit it
customer_reviews.text: Just what a coach needs but in this case this coaches nephew wanted for off season training, never sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Basketball
customer_reviews.text: Great for basketball. Getting the player use to getting hit while driving to the basket
customer_reviews.author: S3ven

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: Used this with my son's basketball training to help learn to absorb contact and it has shown immediate benefits. He no longer avoids contact but goes to the basket strong, takes the contact and finishes strong or gets fouled. He gets to the foul line at a higher rate than before and has increased his scoring and assists, since his drives draws the defense and opens up more passing lanes to his teammates.
customer_reviews.author: Garfield Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great shield good enough for drills.
customer_reviews.text: Very good shield for any sport blocking drills,bball drills very useful. Straps not the best place to be cant control the hit and impact of a hit if doing football blocking drills.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My son has enjoyed this Christmas present immensely. He is outside many days using this to improve his skills.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than my hitting my chest!
customer_reviews.text: Using to bump my 6'6" 210lbs son for inside basketball moves. Straps are a bit tight to put arm through, but quality is sufficient and serves purpose.
customer_reviews.author: DadO'Three

customer_reviews.title: Great low price for a good pad.
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!! I read previous reviews about the the straps not being so great. I agree. Wish they were more of a handle instead of a strap. That's my two cents.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Griego

customer_reviews.title: Grade school girl's basketball coach wanted this. He uses ...
customer_reviews.text: Grade school girl's basketball coach wanted this. He uses it in practice and states it has been a real help in training them for proper agressive play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We use this shield for basketball post practice. It has great padding that isn't too hard or too soft. The size is just right too. We recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Alecia Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Used for basketball
customer_reviews.text: Great for basketball training, I use it to simulate a defender and can hit players somewhat hard without worrying about hurting anyone. Really helps to teach them how to handle contact.
customer_reviews.author: bottleneck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly I am using for my little league football team
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo Wright

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I am a basketball coach and this held up well for practices. It is very durable and I like where the handles are located on the back. Great purchase 👌
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: It’s a football pad, like your coaches had in Hs
customer_reviews.text: Worked for what it’s intended. Use this with my son practicing at home during the off season
customer_reviews.author: Shea OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly but with one of the seams open. ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly but with one of the seams open. Wish it wasn't torn. Too humbug to return from Hawaii.
customer_reviews.author: DaCo

customer_reviews.title: A most have to work with on any football, basketball, martial arts, and other teams. Money well spent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!! I've been using this practicing with my son who is a freshman lineman on our high school football team. Great price for the same quality that we used in college football

customer_reviews.title: Excited!
customer_reviews.text: Great detail, seems well put together, so far so good.

customer_reviews.title: Bump and go
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Using it to practice contact for basketball.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a former college athlete and now high school coach, and this shield is solid. Super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan j hair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect for working with my son on his low post moves for basketball.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for working on low post moves! Handles are a little ruff on the hands
customer_reviews.author: austin b.

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well so far
customer_reviews.text: As a Football coach this sheild has been getting a lot of work. It is holding up well and the shipping was fast. This was also the best price I could find on the internet. **2019 Update - This is still holding up well. Been using for football and basketball. No real wear and tear to speak of. Good quality over all.
customer_reviews.author: DXL

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Training Tool!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this blocking shield to protect myself while teaching blocking and tackling techniques to my son. It is easy to use, not too bulky and provides great shock absorption. Even using standard shipping speed, it arrived at my door in 3 days. I've used it many times over the past 3 weeks and it is wearing quite well... VERY NICE!
customer_reviews.author: D. Buxman

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag it's a huge help in training my ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag it's a huge help in training my football clients in proper blocking techniques and you can't beat the price. Works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Verified Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Great for youth basketball
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I use it for youth basketball training. Nice quality and a nice price.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesville Dad

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Great for a guy who is coaching girls to box out.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Luebke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and serves it's purpose!
customer_reviews.text: This was my son's first year in football so I felt I better get him used to hitting things. This is made very well and can take the hits. I use this combined with a speed ladder and a tackling dummy for drills in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Criminal

customer_reviews.title: Great for flag football, practice blocking
customer_reviews.text: We use this for my son's flag football team. It really helps with the kids to practice blocking. They love using it
customer_reviews.author: Ryjo

customer_reviews.title: Great price for what you get
customer_reviews.text: The boys have been using this to work on floaters and contact at the basket on drives. They love it as it lets them continue to work on fundamentals they've learned at various camps.
customer_reviews.author: Donut4life

customer_reviews.title: I would think that there would be a better handle available for these pads to make it a ...
customer_reviews.text: It is accomplishing what we need done for basketball practice. We use it for lane shooting drills to similate what happens in the paint in basketball. Only complaint (like I've read previously) are the handles. I would think that there would be a better handle available for these pads to make it a little more user friendly. Otherwise, this product is accomplishing the goal.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kearbey

customer_reviews.title: More durable than I thought
customer_reviews.text: It's been great for my little guys, would be good enough for grown men
customer_reviews.author: Colby L. Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: Since my son literally plays every sport, I'm always looking to save where I can. Bought 1 to workout with my son and to check the quality. The price can't be beat. Will buy more this summer for my pop warner team.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Works great for helping with youth basketball
customer_reviews.text: Works great for helping with youth basketball. Some of the boys don't like the contact when going up for a layup and this helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Skroch

customer_reviews.title: Good blocking pad
customer_reviews.text: My husband and the neighborhood children have enjoyed using this pad for football and lacrosse drills. It is well padded and a manageable size. The strap on the back is very helpful too.
customer_reviews.author: Aem

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Is very durable and lots of uses for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: JAnimal

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the price. Holding up well after 2 months using it 3-4xs a week
customer_reviews.author: Teuila Ili

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for my post players and will everyone does layup drills

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for basketball practice. It has been really durable so far.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Great Shield! Fast shipping ! Unbeatable price!! Great Shield! Fast shipping ! Unbeatable price!! Great Shield! Fast shipping ! Unbeatable price!!

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised. Great durability and very useful for basketball post drills and guard toughness. Just wish it was considered just as much a piece of basketball equipment as it is for football. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Basketball contact
customer_reviews.text: Score every time with contact now, very good for low post training. The pad is strong and light weight, very good for all drills.
customer_reviews.author: marv

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the kids occupied.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew's birthday since he's wanting to get into football. He and his siblings have been using it as a punching pad. Eh. It's durible enough, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: H. Marie Salz

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for my son during his football season. Worked perfect
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good Pads
customer_reviews.text: I will be ordering another one. Nice thick pad. The only thing are the straps but hey nothing is perfect. Straps are a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: Rowhan E. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Mike from Bay City basketball loves Pro Down Bkocking shields
customer_reviews.text: The pro down blocking shield is the perfect tool to use for my girls basketball program. It allows me to be physical while teaching my teams how to box out and handle being bumped and jostled during games.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Slade

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect item for our basketball practice needs. It is the perfect thickness and size. The only thing I wish was different are the style of handles on the back of the pad. They are sometimes uncomfortable to hold/use for extended periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Loya

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and well worth the price. This isn't the cheap little Wal Mart pads. These are more like military training pads.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: It's great minus the tear
customer_reviews.text: There was a tear on the back of the shield. I was going to send it back but needed it for training my clients. It's great minus the tear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm very much pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to get my daughter use to the contact of sports. I'm very much pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Demare

customer_reviews.title: Hobbit bed or Practice Pad?
customer_reviews.text: What is there to say really? It's a mini, curved mattress with a tough vinyl cover. While i don't use it for bedding Hobbits, I'm sure you could if you wanted to. I personally like using it to live vicariously through my son. If you plan on raising the next JJ Watt, you're gonna need one of these. You can pretend to be a real NFL coach and your kid can take out all his aggression at the same time! That's a win-win situation right there!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong product. I received a loweback backseat support instead of the proshield
customer_reviews.author: Yvondra

customer_reviews.title: outstanding
customer_reviews.text: outstanding peace of equipment for helping the kids get ready for football and all at a good price to pay
customer_reviews.author: winston bickley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any age
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any age....both our 4 year old daughter and 11 year old son gets lots of use out of this though for completely different reasons lol. If straps would have been a little longer it would have gotten all 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: jennarae1013

customer_reviews.title: Basketball equipment
customer_reviews.text: Great teaching tool for basketball. We use it to teach our players to play through contact when driving to the basket.

customer_reviews.title: Great teaching tool for both our girls and boys basketball teams.
customer_reviews.text: Allows us to work on the offensive and defensive aspects in the screening game, rebounding and defense of cutters to the ball

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Very durable as it held up to the rigors of 7-9 year olds last season.

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived in new condition and is made with ...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in new condition and is made with quality material. I believe the product will last a long time for my intended use.

customer_reviews.title: Hockey Drills for Battles and Checking
customer_reviews.text: I use this to prepare my young hockey players for battles along the boards and checking.

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Well put together. Holds up to the abuse of football drills.

customer_reviews.title: Great for backyard practice
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old is in his second year of football and this pad is very helpful for me to help review what he did in practice

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal Anywhere
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat this deal. Made to take a beating by a buffalo, can be scratched by the pee wee boys, and the price is even better

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for pee wee football lineman training. Excellent product, would definitely purchase more.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!! Fantastic price.
customer_reviews.text: These hand shields are perfect for the kids I coach (8-9 year olds). I can't wait to get practicing with them. I have another pair like them that I paid much more for, and Amazon has it right with these.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Item
customer_reviews.text: Great item and in perfect condition. I would recommend it to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked Sturdy construction...Did Not like handles. Too tight, should be adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and holding up well. The price was half of what I found in stores and the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Antwan Jones

customer_reviews.title: It was exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: My grandson needed help with his blocking skills and the Pro Down Shield was what I needed to keep me safe. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look like it will last long
customer_reviews.text: It's okay for the price. I use it to train kids in basketball. Isn't very forgiving to the kids and the straps are already fraying. Doesn't look like it will last long.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Garza

customer_reviews.title: Blocking Shield
customer_reviews.text: Does what I needed. Good for the money. Don't know how long it will last. Glad I bought it. Exactly like the pics.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Grace

customer_reviews.title: Nice durable vinyl
customer_reviews.text: Shield made it through rigors of practice. Nice durable vinyl. Great alternative to teach new football players that initial punch with hands to the numbers/chest. Maybe to have numbers on the shield would be better for new players.
customer_reviews.author: knuk 36

customer_reviews.title: Great Pad
customer_reviews.text: Why pay 100 dollars when you can get what you want for 35. Love the pad has helped so much with teaching kids to block.
customer_reviews.author: Number 1

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Well padded and very sturdy product! I use if for youth football and it helps protect the Coaches and Players when doing contact drills. It was very beneficial as a teaching tool to show the players the proper form for tackling as well as blocking. The pad itself is very stiff but not to firm, would definitely recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Quan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Using it for training my son and daughter in basketball and soccer. Very well made, padding is good. Able to push without hurting them.
customer_reviews.author: gerald gonzales

customer_reviews.title: You would be a "dummy" not to get this!
customer_reviews.text: Just like our highschools and local college uses! I got it for a peewee team and its perfect! Affordable and high quality makes me very glad I went with this over anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rowe

customer_reviews.title: good value item
customer_reviews.text: I am a football coach and have used this pad for my sessions with clients. ITs not the most ideal for football, but it does the job and is light enough to travel with
customer_reviews.author: chaim

product_meta.title: Pro Down Collegiate Shield 16"X26" (EA)
product_meta.description: Nylon-reinforced vinyl cover - Two handles - 5'' thick shock-foam core. Please Note: Black is in stock and available for immediate delivery.
